item.title: Patents
item.description:
Patent Portfolio: Jean-Fran√ßois Rondeau

Professional Focus: Automotive Acoustics, Noise Vibration & Harshness (NVH), Audio Systems, and Material Engineering.
Primary Assignee: Faurecia (Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe, Faurecia Automotive Industrie).

üìå Summary of Patents & Applications

The following list includes published patent applications and granted patents where Jean-Fran√ßois Rondeau is listed as an inventor.

Patent Title Patent / Publication Number Filing / Publication Date Assignee Co-Inventors
Audio method and system for a seat headrest US 12,317,060 (Grant*) Also published as US2022/0329949 Filed: Dec 22, 2020 Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe Christophe Mattei, Nicolas Pignier
Method to produce a surface covering US 2014/0339725 A1 Pub: Nov 20, 2014 Faurecia Interieur Philippe-Jean Marcq
Soundproofing structure EP 1 474 314 B1 Also published as FR2839294 Grant: Sep 7, 2010 Filed: Apr 17, 2004 Faurecia Automotive Industrie Arnaud Duval, Val√©rie Marcel, Patrice Charbonnier
Process for manufacturing a structure of equipment FR 2 925 388 Filed: Dec 20, 2007 Faurecia Interieur Didier Liaud, Philippe Marcq, Val√©rie Marcel

*Note: Recent search data suggests a grant date scheduled or listed for 2025 in some databases; the application was filed in 2020.

Driving Technological Advancement on a Global Stage

Bridging the gap between science and market

üîç Expertise & Interests

Area Key Focus
NVH & Acoustics Noise, vibration, and harshness optimization, acoustic engineering, comfort enhancement
Artificial Intelligence Industrial applications, process optimization, generative AI
Deep & Machine Learning Predictive modeling, computer vision, system integration
Automotive Electronic and material architectures, embedded systems, sustainable mobility
Sustainable Development Eco-design, circular economy, green technologies
Innovation Digital transformation, innovation management, product strategy

üìå Biography

Leadership & Strategic Vision

  • Technical and Innovation Director with a proven track record in building and leading high-performing, multicultural, and multidisciplinary teams to deliver breakthrough innovations.
  • Expert in Materials and Electronics Architectures (HW/SW) for Automotive and Aeronautics, translating disruptive technologies into impactful business solutions.

Approach & Achievements

  • Product Strategy: Leads strategic product planning and roadmap execution at Tr√®ves Group, aligning market trends and customer insights to drive global innovation.
  • Innovation & Transformation: Spearheads cross-functional innovation and business transformation projects, with strong skills in marketing strategy and solution development.
  • International Collaboration: Fosters a dynamic culture of knowledge sharing and global teamwork, enabling continuous growth and pioneering achievements.

Core Values

‚úÖ Results-Driven: Focused on measurable impact and value creation. ‚úÖ Agility: Adapts to technological and market shifts. ‚úÖ Innovation Culture: Promotes creativity and operational excellence.
